trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration information used by <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension" />.
trans-unit.target: 定义 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension" /> 使用的配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The message filter table to use for this configuration.
trans-unit.target: 要用于此配置的消息筛选器表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> can only examine message headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 只能检查消息标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> and routeOnHeadersOnly parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration" /> 和 routeOnHeadersOnly 参数创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示消息是否以其发送顺序进行调度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if messages are to be dispatched in the order they were sent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息按照发送时的顺序调度，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> used by this configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此配置使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The message filter table.
trans-unit.target: 消息筛选器表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the filter can examine the message body.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示筛选器是否能检查消息正文。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the filter can only examine message headers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果筛选器只能检查消息标头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**true**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages should be processed between SOAP <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" />s.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应处理 SOAP <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion" /> 之间的消息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if messages should be processed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应处理消息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: SOAP processing is the process where messages are converted between SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>s.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 处理是一个过程，在此过程中可将消息在 SOAP <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> 之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Setting this value to `false` indicates that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> should not install the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on the client endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 此值设置为`false`指示<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>不应在安装<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>上的客户端终结点。

trans-unit.source: If set to `false`, you must add your own message inspector or other code to handle some aspects of messages before they are sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为`false`，必须添加您自己的消息检查器或其他代码以在发送之前处理消息的某些方面。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to disable SOAP processing on each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 还有可能上每个终结点禁用 SOAP 处理。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> 类。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> creates and attaches a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A> set to `true` for each client endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>创建并附加一个新<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>与<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior.ProcessMessages%2A>设置为`true`每个客户端终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on a specific endpoint, create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> with this value set to `false` and then attach it to the endpoint on which you do not want processing to occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想要使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>上特定终结点，创建一个新<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>此值设置为`false`然后将其附加到终结点在其你不希望处理发生。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> observes that a client already has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, it does not attempt to attach another.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> 观察到客户端已具有一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>，则它不会尝试附加另一个 。

trans-unit.source: To disable the application of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> on any endpoint, disable SOAP processing on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用的应用程序<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>任何终结点上禁用 SOAP 处理<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration.SoapProcessingEnabled%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> is added to the client endpoint <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration.SoapProcessingEnabled%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>添加到客户端终结点<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>集合。
